products.name: iPhone 13 Pro
products.shortDescription: The latest Pro model from Apple.
products.description: The iPhone 13 Pro is Apple's flagship device with a stunning Super Retina XDR display and an ultra-powerful A15 Bionic chip. It features a triple-camera system with advanced computational photography capabilities. With its premium design, Face ID, and extensive storage options, the iPhone 13 Pro sets new standards for smartphones.

products.name: Vivo X60 Pro
products.shortDescription: A smartphone with advanced camera capabilities.
products.description: The Vivo X60 Pro features a partnership with ZEISS for its camera system, delivering exceptional photography performance. It comes with a 48MP main sensor and features innovative image stabilization technology. With its sleek design, powerful processor, and vibrant display, the Vivo X60 Pro is a solid choice for photography enthusiasts.

products.name: Oppo Find X3 Pro
products.shortDescription: A flagship smartphone with a stunning display.
products.description: The Oppo Find X3 Pro boasts a vibrant and high-refresh-rate display that enhances the viewing experience. It features a powerful Snapdragon 888 processor and a versatile quad-camera system. With its sleek design, advanced camera capabilities, and fast charging support, the Oppo Find X3 Pro offers a premium smartphone experience.

products.name: Sony Xperia 1 III
products.shortDescription: A smartphone designed for multimedia enthusiasts.
products.description: The Sony Xperia 1 III offers a stunning 4K OLED display and a powerful Snapdragon 888 processor. It features a triple-camera system developed in collaboration with Sony's Alpha camera engineers, delivering exceptional photography capabilities. With its audio enhancements and 5G connectivity, the Xperia 1 III is a multimedia powerhouse.

products.name: Realme 8 Pro
products.shortDescription: A  smartphone with excellent camera capabilities.
products.description: The Realme 8 Pro offers great value for money with its impressive camera setup and attractive design. It features a 108MP primary camera sensor, enabling you to capture high-resolution photos with rich details. With its AMOLED display and fast charging support, the Realme 8 Pro is an ideal choice for budget-conscious photography enthusiasts.

products.name: Vivo X60 Pro
products.shortDescription: A smartphone with advanced camera capabilities.
products.description: The Vivo X60 Pro features a partnership with ZEISS for its camera system, delivering exceptional photography performance. It comes with a 48MP main sensor and features innovative image stabilization technology. With its sleek design, powerful processor, and vibrant display, the Vivo X60 Pro is a solid choice for photography enthusiasts.

products.name: Oppo Find X3 Pro
products.shortDescription: A flagship smartphone with a stunning display.
products.description: The Oppo Find X3 Pro boasts a vibrant and high-refresh-rate display that enhances the viewing experience. It features a powerful Snapdragon 888 processor and a versatile quad-camera system. With its sleek design, advanced camera capabilities, and fast charging support, the Oppo Find X3 Pro offers a premium smartphone experience.

products.name: iPhone SE (2020)
products.shortDescription: A compact iPhone with powerful performance.
products.description: The iPhone SE (2020) combines the power of the latest A13 Bionic chip with the iconic design of the iPhone 8. It features a 4.7-inch Retina HD display and a single-camera system that delivers impressive photography results. With its affordable price point and compact size, the iPhone SE (2020) appeals to those seeking a budget-friendly iPhone experience.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra
products.shortDescription: A feature-rich smartphone with a stylus.
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra is a powerhouse device with a stunning display and an S Pen stylus. It features a large Dynamic AMOLED display, a powerful Exynos 990 processor, and a versatile triple-camera system. With its productivity-enhancing features and premium design, the Galaxy Note 20 Ultra is an ideal choice for professionals.

products.name: Google Pixel 5
products.shortDescription: A compact and capable smartphone.
products.description: The Google Pixel 5 offers a compact and comfortable design with a 6-inch OLED display. It features a powerful Snapdragon 765G processor and a dual-camera system that delivers impressive photography results. With its clean Android experience and guaranteed software updates, the Pixel 5 is a reliable choice for those seeking a pure Google experience.

products.name: OnePlus 9
products.shortDescription: A flagship smartphone with Hasselblad partnership.
products.description: The OnePlus 9 combines a sleek design with top-of-the-line hardware and software features. It features a 6.55-inch Fluid AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 888 processor, and a triple-camera system co-developed with Hasselblad. With its fast charging capabilities and OxygenOS software, the OnePlus 9 offers a flagship-level smartphone experience.

products.name: Xiaomi Mi 11X Pro
products.shortDescription: A powerful smartphone at an affordable price.
products.description: The Xiaomi Mi 11X Pro offers flagship-level performance without breaking the bank. It features a Snapdragon 888 processor, a vibrant Super AMOLED display, and a versatile triple-camera system. With its 5G capabilities and fast charging support, the Mi 11X Pro is a solid choice for tech enthusiasts on a budget.

products.name: Sony Xperia 5 III
products.shortDescription: A compact smartphone with powerful features.
products.description: The Sony Xperia 5 III packs a punch with its compact form factor and impressive performance. It features a 6.1-inch OLED display, a Snapdragon 888 processor, and a triple-camera system developed in collaboration with Sony's Alpha camera engineers. With its 5G capabilities and audio enhancements, the Xperia 5 III offers a premium smartphone experience.

products.name: LG Velvet
products.shortDescription: A stylish smartphone with a unique design.
products.description: The LG Velvet stands out with its stylish and ergonomic design. It features a 6.8-inch P-OLED display, a Snapdragon 765G processor, and a versatile triple-camera system. With its 5G capabilities and Dual Screen accessory support, the LG Velvet offers a differentiated smartphone experience.

products.name: Realme X7 Pro
products.shortDescription: A mid-range smartphone with powerful performance.
products.description: The Realme X7 Pro offers impressive performance and features at an affordable price point. It features a 6.55-inch Super AMOLED display, a MediaTek Dimensity 1000+ processor, and a quad-camera system. With its 5G capabilities and fast charging support, the Realme X7 Pro is a great option for those seeking a balance between performance and value.

products.name: Vivo V21
products.shortDescription: A selfie-focused smartphone with a sleek design.
products.description: The Vivo V21 is designed for selfie enthusiasts, featuring a high-resolution front camera and advanced selfie features. It also boasts a 6.44-inch AMOLED display, a MediaTek Dimensity 800U processor, and a versatile triple-camera system. With its slim profile and 5G capabilities, the Vivo V21 is a stylish and capable smartphone.

products.name: Oppo Reno 5 Pro+
products.shortDescription: A premium smartphone with excellent camera capabilities.
products.description: The Oppo Reno 5 Pro+ combines a sleek design with powerful camera features. It features a 6.55-inch AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 865 processor, and a quad-camera system that includes a 50MP Sony IMX766 sensor. With its fast charging support and 5G capabilities, the Reno 5 Pro+ offers a premium smartphone experience.

products.name: iPhone 12
products.shortDescription: A flagship iPhone with a powerful processor.
products.description: The iPhone 12 features a sleek design and a powerful A14 Bionic chip. It comes with a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, a dual-camera system, and 5G capabilities. With its MagSafe support and iOS ecosystem, the iPhone 12 offers a premium smartphone experience.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy A52
products.shortDescription: A mid-range smartphone with a versatile camera system.
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy A52 offers a balanced combination of features and affordability. It features a 6.5-inch Super AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 720G processor, and a quad-camera system. With its IP67 water and dust resistance rating, the Galaxy A52 is a reliable companion for everyday use.

products.name: Google Pixel 4a
products.shortDescription: A budget-friendly smartphone with a great camera.
products.description: The Google Pixel 4a offers an exceptional camera experience at an affordable price. It features a 5.81-inch OLED display, a Snapdragon 730G processor, and a single-camera system that delivers impressive photography results. With its clean Android experience and guaranteed software updates, the Pixel 4a is a solid choice for budget-conscious users.

products.name: OnePlus Nord 2
products.shortDescription: A mid-range smartphone with flagship-level performance.
products.description: The OnePlus Nord 2 offers flagship-level performance at a more affordable price point. It features a 6.43-inch Fluid AMOLED display, a MediaTek Dimensity 1200-AI processor, and a versatile triple-camera system. With its fast charging capabilities and OxygenOS software, the OnePlus Nord 2 delivers a premium smartphone experience.

products.name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro
products.shortDescription: A feature-packed smartphone at an affordable price.
products.description: The Xiaomi Redmi Note 10 Pro offers a feature-packed smartphone experience without breaking the bank. It features a 6.67-inch Super AMOLED display, a Snapdragon 732G processor, and a quad-camera system. With its large battery and fast charging support, the Redmi Note 10 Pro is a reliable choice for everyday use.

products.name: Sony Xperia 10 III
products.shortDescription: A mid-range smartphone with a compact design.
products.description: The Sony Xperia 10 III offers a compact design and solid performance. It features a 6-inch OLED display, a Snapdragon 690 processor, and a triple-camera system. With its water and dust resistance rating and audio enhancements, the Xperia 10 III is a reliable and versatile smartphone.

products.name: LG Q70
products.shortDescription: A mid-range smartphone with a durable build.
products.description: The LG Q70 is designed for durability, featuring MIL-STD-810G compliance and IP68 water and dust resistance rating. It offers a 6.4-inch FHD+ display, a Snapdragon 675 processor, and a triple-camera system. With its large battery and expandable storage, the LG Q70 is a reliable companion for outdoor activities.

products.name: Realme Narzo 30 Pro
products.shortDescription: An affordable 5G smartphone with impressive performance.
products.description: The Realme Narzo 30 Pro offers 5G capabilities at an affordable price point. It features a 6.5-inch IPS LCD display, a MediaTek Dimensity 800U processor, and a triple-camera system. With its large battery and fast charging support, the Narzo 30 Pro is a great choice for users looking for a budget-friendly 5G smartphone.

products.name: Vivo Y72 5G
products.shortDescription: An affordable 5G smartphone with a large display.
products.description: The Vivo Y72 5G offers an affordable 5G smartphone experience with its large 6.58-inch IPS LCD display. It features a MediaTek Dimensity 700 processor and a dual-camera system. With its large battery and 5G capabilities, the Y72 5G is a reliable and affordable choice for users looking to experience the benefits of 5G connectivity.
